enterConferenceNameOrUrl: Enter a Room Name For Your Meeting
recentListLabel: Rejoin One Of Your Recent Meetings

onboarding.conferenceUrl: Enter the name of the room you want to join. You may make a name up, just let others know so they enter the same name.
onboarding.settingsDrawerButton: Click here to open the settings drawer.
onboarding.serverSetting: If you have an another self-hosted Jitsi Meet Server you can enter the server URL here followed by `https://`. But most of the times you do not need to edit this!
onboarding.serverTimeout: Timeout to join a meeting, if the meeting hasn't been joined before the timeout hits, it's cancelled.
onboarding.alwaysOnTop: You can toggle whether you want to enable the "always-on-top" window, which is displayed when the main window loses focus. This will be applied to all conferences.
